name: cosmic-creator
description: A Web3 Talent Verification & Skill Tokenization Protocol integrated with Talent Protocol

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:contracts" "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.build: npm run build:contracts && npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.test: npm run test:contracts && npm run test:backend
scripts.deploy:local: cd contracts && forge script script/Deploy.s.sol:Deploy --rpc-url http://localhost:8545 --broadcast
